trans-unit.source: Exploring the Windows PowerShell ISE
powershell,cmdlet
Exploring the Windows PowerShell ISE
You can use the Windows PowerShell® Integrated Scripting Environment (ISE) to create, run, and debug commands and scripts.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 Windows PowerShell® 集成脚本环境 (ISE) 来创建、运行及调试命令和脚本。

trans-unit.source: The Windows PowerShell ISE consists of the menu bar, Windows PowerShell tabs, the toolbar, script tabs, a Script Pane, a Console Pane, a status bar, a text-size slider and context-sensitive Help.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell ISE 包含菜单栏、Windows PowerShell 选项卡、工具栏、脚本选项卡、脚本窗格、控制台窗格、状态栏、文字大小滑块和区分上下文的帮助。

trans-unit.source: Beginning with Windows PowerShell ISE 3.0 the Command and Output Panes were combined into a single Console Pane.
trans-unit.target: 以 Windows PowerShell ISE 3.0 开头的命令和输出窗格已合并为单一的控制台窗格。

trans-unit.source: Menu Bar
The menu bar contains the **File**, **Edit**, **View**, **Tools**, **Debug**, **Add-ons**, and **Help** menus.
The buttons on the menus allow you to perform tasks related to writing and running scripts and running commands in the Windows PowerShell ISE.
trans-unit.target: 菜单上的按钮允许执行与编写和运行脚本以及在 Windows PowerShell ISE 中运行命令相关的任务。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, an [add-on tool](../../core-powershell/ise/The-ISEAddOnTool-Object.md) may be placed on the menu bar by running scripts that use the [Windows PowerShell ISE Scripting Object Model](../../core-powershell/ise/The-Windows-PowerShell-ISE-Scripting-Object-Model.md).
trans-unit.target: 此外，可以通过运行使用 [Windows PowerShell ISE 脚本对象模型](../../core-powershell/ise/The-Windows-PowerShell-ISE-Scripting-Object-Model.md)的脚本将[外接程序工具](../../core-powershell/ise/The-ISEAddOnTool-Object.md)放置在菜单栏上。

trans-unit.source: In Windows PowerShell ISE 2.0, The **Tools** and **Add-ons** menus were not present.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell ISE 2.0 中，不存在“**工具**”和“**加载项**”菜单。

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell Tabs
A Windows PowerShell tab is the environment in which a Windows PowerShell script runs.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 选项卡是 Windows PowerShell 脚本可在其中运行的环境。

trans-unit.source: You can open new Windows PowerShell tabs in the Windows PowerShell ISE to create separate environments on your local computer or on remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 可以在 Windows PowerShell ISE 中打开新的 Windows PowerShell 选项卡以在本地计算机或远程计算机上创建单独的环境。

trans-unit.source: You may have a maximum of eight PowerShell tabs simultaneously open.
trans-unit.target: 最多可同时打开八个 PowerShell 选项卡。

trans-unit.source: Toolbar
The following buttons are located on the toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 下面的按钮位于工具栏上。

trans-unit.source: Button
Function
New
Opens a new script.
Open
Opens an existing script or file.
Save
Saves a script or file.
Cut
Cuts the selected text and copies it to the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 剪切所选文本并将其复制到剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: Copy
Copies the selected text to the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 将选择的文本复制到剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: Paste
Pastes the contents of the clipboard at the cursor location.
trans-unit.target: 将剪贴板内容粘贴到光标所在位置。

trans-unit.source: Clear Output Pane
Clears all content in the Output Pane.
trans-unit.target: 清除输出窗格中的所有内容。

trans-unit.source: Undo
Reverses the action that was just performed.
Redo
Performs the action that was just undone.
Run Script
Runs a script.
Run Selction
Runs a selected portion of a script.
Stop Execution
Stops a script that is running.
New Remote PowerShell Tab
trans-unit.target: 新建远程 PowerShell 选项卡

trans-unit.source: Creates a new PowerShell Tab that establishes a session on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 创建将在远程计算机上建立会话的新 PowerShell 选项卡。

trans-unit.source: A dialog box appears and prompts you to enter details required to establish the remote connection.
trans-unit.target: 将出现一个对话框，提示你输入建立远程连接所需的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Start PowerShell.exe
Opens a PowerShell Console.
trans-unit.target: 打开 Windows PowerShell 控制台。

trans-unit.source: Show Script Pane Top
Moves the Script Pane to the top in the display.
trans-unit.target: 将脚本窗格移动到显示器顶部。

trans-unit.source: Show Script Pane Right
Moves the Script Pane to the right in the display.
trans-unit.target: 将脚本窗格移动到显示器右侧。

trans-unit.source: Show Script Pane Maximized
Maximizes the Script Pane.
Script Tab
Displays the name of the script you are editing.
trans-unit.target: 显示正在编辑的脚本的名称。

trans-unit.source: You can click a script tab to select the script you want to edit.
trans-unit.target: 可以单击脚本选项卡以选择你想编辑的脚本。

trans-unit.source: When you point to the script tab, the fully qualified path to the script file appears in a tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 当指向脚本选项卡时，脚本文件的完整限定路径将显示在工具提示中。

trans-unit.source: Script Pane
Allows you to create and run scripts.
You can open, edit and run existing scripts in the Script Pane.
trans-unit.target: 可以在脚本窗格中打开、编辑和运行现有脚本。

trans-unit.source: Output Pane
Displays the results of the commands and scripts you have run.
trans-unit.target: 显示已运行的命令和脚本的结果。

trans-unit.source: You can also copy and clear the contents in the Output Pane.
trans-unit.target: 还可以在输出窗格中复制和清除内容。

trans-unit.source: Command Pane
Allows you to write commands.
You can run a one line command or a multiline command in the Command Pane.
trans-unit.target: 可以在命令窗格中运行单行命令或多行命令。

trans-unit.source: Press SHIFT+ENTER to enter each line of a multiline command, and press ENTER after the last line to execute the multiline command.
trans-unit.target: 按 SHIFT+ENTER 以输入多行命令的每一行，并在输入最后一行后按 ENTER 以执行该多行命令。

trans-unit.source: The prompt displayed on top of the Command Pane shows the path to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 命令窗格顶部显示的提示将展示当前工作目录的路径。

trans-unit.source: Status Bar
Allows you to see whether the commands and scripts that you run are complete.
trans-unit.target: 允许查看你运行的命令和脚本是否完成。

trans-unit.source: The status bar is at the very bottom of the display.
trans-unit.target: 状态栏位于显示器最底部。

trans-unit.source: Selected portions of error messages are displayed on the status bar.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息的已选部分将显示在状态栏中。

trans-unit.source: Text-Size Slider
Increases or decreases the size of the text on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 增大或减小屏幕上的文字大小。

trans-unit.source: Help
Help for Windows PowerShell ISE is available on the Web in the TechNet Library.
trans-unit.target: 可在 Web 上的 TechNet 库中找到有关 Windows PowerShell ISE 的帮助。

trans-unit.source: You can open the Help by clicking **Windows PowerShell ISE Help** on the **Help** menu or by pressing the F1 key anywhere except when the cursor is on a cmdlet name in either the Script Pane or the Console Pane.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过单击“帮助”菜单上的“Windows PowerShell ISE 帮助”打开帮助，或通过在任意位置（光标在脚本窗格或控制台窗格中的 cmdlet 名称上时除外）按 F1 键打开帮助。

trans-unit.source: From the **Help** menu you can also run the Update-Help cmdlet, and display the Command Window which assists you in constructing commands by showing you all of the parameters for a cmdlet and enabling you to fill in the parameters in an easy-to-use form.
trans-unit.target: 从“**帮助**”菜单还可以运行 Update-Help cmdlet 和显示命令窗口，该命令窗口可显示某个 cmdlet 的所有参数并允许你在易于使用的窗体中填写参数，从而帮助你构造命令。

trans-unit.source: See Also
Using the Windows PowerShell ISE
